document_data.caption: Delzorin Street, ''circa'' [[1492 DR]].{{Waterdeep-time}}
document_data.name: Delzorin Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Delzorin Street''' was a street in [[Waterdeep]] that ran east to west in the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]]. The street ended on a left turn at [[Whaelgond Way]].

Notable Locations.Links to Sewers:
Delzorin Street was used as a reference point for three different surface shafts to enter the [[Waterdeep/Sewers|sewers of Waterdeep]]:
* One that was between [[Sul Street]] and [[Shield Street]] that allowed entrance into a junction room.
* One that was in the block for which the Delzorin Street represented one of its borders.
* One close to the intersection with the Whaelgond Way.
